name: ECFighting
description:
Welcome to ECFighting! (trailer is coming asap)

ECFighting is a casual 2D fighting game for two players. The fighting mechanics are designed around RPS-like balancing and all our fighters have slightly different strengths to abuse and weaknesses to exploit. The game and controls are easy to learn, the rounds are fast - the game is best enjoyed as a party hot seat game in a good company.

Player 1 plays with keyboard and player 2 plays with a controller. Controls can be found on "Controls" menu. 

Features:

- three unique characters: DIA, LEGDAY and D-BEE

- two stages: Space Temple and Arena 404

The game was made as a part of Kajaani University of Applied Science's "Commercial game development" course by Team ExCalibur. The team consists of five freshmen.

The game will be featured later on as part of "Kajaani University of Applied Science's Summer Bundle"!
